name: Grandpa Physics - Rides the Swiss Alps Mountain Range
name_original: Grandpa Physics - Rides the Swiss Alps Mountain Range
description:
Race Grandpa Physics across the Swiss Alps in this challenging uphill bike rider game. We’ve included some fun water physics, gravity bottles, health bonuses and power ups to get Grandpa across the mountain range in one piece.

Complete the 20 levels in this fun physics based bicycle game and score extra points for backflips and big air along the way!

There’s an accurate altimeter to track your height and speedometer to see how fast you can make Grandpa ride.

Tap the bottom left bicycle cog to pedal and lean backwards and the right cog to pedal and lean forwards. Remember this is a physics based bike game so just tap the controls and try to balance Grandpa when he’s in mid air.

When your health bar on the top right runs out it’s game over. It’s a simple but addictive physics based runner game for all the family and a great game for kids to.

Ride on and more levels coming soon!
